Android, one of Google's biggest and most promising cash cows, last year overtook Apple's iOS as the best-selling mobile platform. It is important to note that although the titles have changed, the core team remains the same... this new team structure makes a lot of sense and could result in faster decision making, JP Morgan technology analyst Imran Khan said. In one of Google's first Securities and Exchange Commission filings, the company described its executive team as a`` triumvirate'' between Eric Schmidt , Larry Page , and Sergey Brin . Although management by committee worked well enough to turn Google into an enormous success, it eventually slowed Google's reaction to popular new ideas such as Facebook and Twitter.
